content.d: Ah, look at this, Rina-san. What do you think?
Do you think Hanpen-san will like it?
Oh, there’s also a chicken tender flavor. Tuna, bonito... Even something called “Tuna & Pumpkin.” This is...
So hard to choose from... Rina-chan Board says, “Woozy.”
Indeed... Is there something Hanpen-san particularly likes?
Particularly...? I don’t know. Hanpen seems to enjoy eating anything.
...Could it be that anything you give her becomes one of her favorite foods? After all, Hanpen-san is very attached to you, Rina-san.
If that’s true, I’d be very happy, but it’s such a big responsibility... I need to think more about which snack would make Hanpen the happiest...!
Hehe. I’ll stay with you until you decide. Let’s think carefully!
